title: Life of Words
description: Participants craft and share their original poems. This event offers a platform for poets to showcase their talent and connect with an audience through the power of words.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
The event is open to individual participants.
Submissions must be original and plagiarism-free.
rules: Poems can be written in English or Tamil.
Participants must submit their entries before the deadline.
Use of AI-generated content is not allowed.
Judging will be based on creativity, originality, and emotional impact.
